name: low-confidence-escalation
description: Supplier email is conversational with no numbers â€” extraction confidence too low, should escalate via pre-policy check
supplierMessage:
Hey!

Great to hear from you again. How was your trip to the trade show? We just finished a big production run for another customer so we have some capacity opening up next month. Let me know what you're thinking and I'll put together some numbers for you.

Talk soon,
Dave
negotiationRules: Accept if price is below $5.00 per unit.
escalationTriggers: Escalate if no pricing provided after clarification.
